content.query:
use  nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT *
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT ='CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
   
    )
    WITH(
        date_key INT,
        date    DATE,
        year    SMALLINT,
        month   TINYINT,
        day     TINYINT,
        day_name varchar(20),
        day_of_year SMALLINT,
        week_of_year TINYINT,
        month_name VARCHAR(20),
        year_month    INT,
        year_week INT

    )AS [result]

---- to get detail datatypes

EXEC sys.sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT *
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''calendar.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT =''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
   
    )
    WITH(
        date_key INT,
        date    DATE,
        year    SMALLINT,
        month   TINYINT,
        day     TINYINT,
        day_name varchar(20),
        day_of_year SMALLINT,
        week_of_year TINYINT,
        month_name VARCHAR(20),
        year_month    INT,
        year_week INT

    )AS [result]'
